./script.sh -h

<The general help message of my script>
Usage: ./script.sh [--option1 <arg>] [--option2 <arg>] [-h|--help] <positional>
	<positional>: <positional's help message goes here>
	--option1: <option1's help message goes here> (no default)
	--option2: <option2's help message goes here> (no default)
	-h,--help: Prints help
